short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Innguma handy features for Information Factory

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Handy features for Intelsuite users. Innguma is a Competitive Intelligence tool focused on gathering and monitoring information from any website.

Our platform requires a subscription. We have different types according to the needs of each type of user. You can find more information about each of them or request a demo account by contacting us through our website https://www.innguma.com/en/contact. Once you have the credentials of an account on our platform https://factory.intelsuite.es and have logged into it, you can add information sources to your user's inbox on the platform using the extension.

The extension allows you to recognize RSS links on pages that have them and add them as sources of information to the user`s sources catalog. Add websites to your inbox or bookmark them to read later, and share website addresses with other users of the https://factory.intelsuite.es. platform.
